chapter.title: Tuning
chapter.para: This chapter contains some tricks you may use to optimize the performance of your LIXA installation.

section.title: Overview
section.para: There are basically 3 factors you can tune in your LIXA installation: number of server threads, min and max elapsed synchronization time, state file disk assignment.
